c1.name: Whimsical Wonders
c1.effect:
Lyney can have 2 **Grin-Malkin Hats** present at once.
Additionally, Prop Arrows will summon 2 Grin-Malkin Hats and grant Lyney 1 extra stack of Prop Surplus. This effect can occur once every 15s.

c2.name: Loquacious Cajoling
c2.effect: When Lyney is on the field, he will gain a stack of Crisp Focus every 2s. Each stack will increase his CRIT DMG by 20%. Max 3 stacks. This effect will be canceled when Lyney leaves the field.

c3.name: Prestidigitation
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Normal Attack: Card Force Translocation** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Well-Versed, Well-Rehearsed
c4.effect: After an opponent is hit by Lyney's Pyro Charged Attack, this opponent's Pyro RES will be decreased by 20% for 6s.

c5.name: To Pierce Enigmas
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Wondrous Trick: Miracle Parade** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Guarded Smile
c6.effect: When Lyney fires a **Prop Arrow**, he will fire a Pyrotechnic Strike: Reprised that will deal 80% of a Pyrotechnic Strike's DMG. This DMG is considered Charged Attack DMG.
